name: Sanctuary
description: A shimmer of bending air wraps a creature you choose, diverting hostile intent. Until the spell ends, any foe attempting to strike or cast a harmful spell on the target must succeed on a Wisdom save or have the effort simply glance aside, forcing them to choose another target or forfeit the attempt. The veil offers no protection against area effects.
components: V, S, M (a sliver of polished glass)
